verbose_text: The GAL4 protein thus produced in a small subset of fru positive cells drives expression from UAS-mCD8 : : GFP for fluorescent marking of the entire structure of these cells as well as expression from UAS-EcR-RNAi for knocking down EcR in these cells.
evidence: GAL4 protein thus produced in a small subset of fru-positive cells drives expression from UAS-mCD8::GFP
